title: Projects
body: A selection of school projects designed and developed from scratch. See complete documentation and source code on my Github profile.
hypertubeDescrip: Video streaming web application where a user creates an account enabling to live stream a movie by searching for a particular reference or select one recommended by the platform.
matchaDescrip: Geolocation based dating web application where users register in order to create a public profile enabling them to discover people around them. Implementation of real time notifications, matching and instant private messaging between users.
abstractVmDescrip: A virtual machine that uses a stack to compute simple arithmetic expressions. These arithmetic expressions are provided to the machine as basic assembly programs and saved as a stack like structure.
shellDescrip: Stable implementation of a Unix shell based on bash and zsh behaviors. Main project of my final first year at 42.
mallocDescrip: Personal implementation of the malloc(), realloc() and free() functions from the C standard library. Used the mmap() and munmap() functions in order to reclaim and give memory back to the system's memory.
